doc.after: The reducible quadratics, in turn, may be determined by expressing the quadratic form as a 3Ã3 matrix: reducible quadratics correspond to this matrix being singular, which is equivalent to its determinant being zero, and the determinant is a homogeneous degree three polynomial in and and corresponds to the resolvent cubic.
